t: Ezekiel 7

The*p word of the Lord*s came to me:
“Son of man, this is what the Lord God*s says to the land of Israel: An*pn end! The end has come on*ln the four corners of the earth.

This*p is what the Lord God*s says: Look,*pn one disaster after another is coming!
